TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ListViewInsertionMark extends System.Object

summary.span: 在 控件中将某项拖动到新位置时，用于指示期望的拖放位置。

span.span: Used to indicate the expected drop location when an item is dragged to a new position in a control.

summary.span: 此功能仅适用于 Windows XP 和更高版本。

span.span: This functionality is available only on Windows XP and later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以 从控件的属性中检索 ，并在将 项拖动到新位置时，使用它直观地指示拖放操作中的预期放置位置。You can retrieve a from the property of a control and use it to visually indicate the expected drop location in a drag-and-drop operation when an item is dragged to a new position. 此功能仅在以下情况下有效 ：当属性设置为时 `true` ，如果 控件未自动对项进行排序，则为。This feature works only when the property is set to `true` and when the control does not sort the items automatically. 若要防止自动排序， 属性必须设置为 ，并且属性必须设置为 、 或 。To prevent automatic sorting, the property must be set to and the property must be set to , , or . 此外，插入标记功能不能用于 分组功能，因为分组功能按组成员按顺序对项进行排序。Additionally, the insertion mark feature cannot be used with the grouping feature because the grouping feature orders the items by group membership. 类通常用于或事件的处理程序中，用于在 拖动项时更新插入标记的位置。The class is typically used in a handler for the or event to update the position of the insertion mark as an item is dragged. 它还在或事件的处理程序中用于将 拖动的项插入到正确的位置。It is also used in a handler for the or event to insert a dragged item at the correct location. 若要更新插入标记的位置，请执行以下步骤：To update the position of the insertion mark, follow these steps: 1. 在或事件的处理程序中 ，使用 属性访问 与该控件关联的对象 。In a handler for the or event, use the property to access the object associated with the control. 2. 使用 方法检索离鼠标指针最近的项的索引。Use the method to retrieve the index of the item closest to the mouse pointer. 3. 将索引值传递给 方法以检索项的边框。Pass the index value to the method to retrieve the bounding rectangle of the item. 4. 如果鼠标指针位于边界矩形中点的左侧，则将 属性设置为 `false` ; 否则，请将其设置为 `true` 。If the mouse pointer is located to the left of the midpoint of the bounding rectangle, set the property to `false`; otherwise, set it to `true`. 5. 将 属性设置为从方法检索到的索引值 。Set the property to the index value retrieved from the method. 插入标记将显示在具有指定索引的项的旁边，具体取决于 属性值。The insertion mark appears next to item with the specified index, either to the left or the right, depending on the property value. 如果将某个项拖动到其自身上，则索引为-1，并且插入标记处于隐藏状态。If an item is dragged over itself, the index is -1 and the insertion mark is hidden. 若要将拖动的项插入到正确的位置，请执行以下步骤：To insert the dragged item at the correct location, follow these steps: 1. 在或事件的处理程序中 ，使用 属性来确定插入标记的当前位置。In a handler for the or event, use the property to determine the current location of the insertion mark. 存储此值，以备稍后用作插入索引。Store this value to be used later as the insertion index. 2. 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则递增存储的插入索引值。If the property is set to `true`, increment the stored insertion index value. 3. 使用 方法将拖动的项的克隆插入到 集合中存储的插入索引处。Use the method to insert a clone of the dragged item into the collection at the stored insertion index. 4. 使用 方法可删除拖动项的原始副本。Use the method to remove the original copy of the dragged item. 在删除原始副本之前，必须先插入拖动项的复本，以便在 插入之前不更改集合中的索引值。You must insert a clone of the dragged item before the original copy is removed so the index values in the collection are not altered before the insertion. 若要确保项的显示顺序与其索引值相同，必须将 属性设置为 按索引值对项进行排序的接口的实现。To ensure that the items are displayed in the same order as their index values, you must set the property to an implementation of the interface that sorts items by index value. 有关详细信息，请参阅 "示例" 部分。For more information, see the Example section. 您可以使用属性修改插入标记的颜色 。You can modify the color of the insertion mark by using the property. 如果需要插入标记的大小或位置，可以通过属性获取其边框 。If you need the size or position of the insertion mark, you can get its bounding rectangle through the property. > [!NOTE] > 当应用程序调用方法时，插入标记功能仅在 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 家族上可用 。The insertion mark feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the method. 在早期的操作系统上，将忽略与插入标记相关的任何代码，并且不会显示插入标记。On earlier operating systems, any code relating to the insertion mark will be ignored and the insertion mark will not appear. 因此，依赖于插入标记功能的任何代码可能无法正常工作。As a result, any code that depends on the insertion mark feature may not work correctly. 你可能想要包含一个测试来确定插入标记功能是否可用，并在其不可用时提供其他功能。You may want to include a test that determines whether the insertion mark feature is available, and provide alternate functionality when it is unavailable. 例如，你可能想要在不支持插入标记的操作系统上运行时，绕过实现拖放项重定位的所有代码。For example, you may want to bypass all code that implements drag-and-drop item repositioning when running on operating systems that do not support insertion marks. > > 插入标记功能由提供操作系统主题功能的相同库提供。The insertion mark feature is provided by the same library that provides the operating system themes feature. 若要检查此库的可用性，请调用 方法重载，并传入 值。To check for the availability of this library, call the method overload and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 插入标记功能并实现使用标准拖动事件的拖放项重新排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature and implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 在事件的处理程序中更新插入标记的位置 。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在此处理程序中，将鼠标指针的位置与最近项的中点进行比较，并使用结果来确定插入标记是显示在项的左侧还是右侧。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CPP/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CS/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/VB/listviewinsertionmarkexample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在项的右侧显示插入标记，该项带有 属性指定的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the insertion mark appears to the right of the item with the index specified by the property.

value.span: 如果在带有索引（由 属性指定）的项的右侧显示插入标记，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the insertion mark appears to the right of the item with the index specified by the property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可让你查找离鼠标指针最近的项，但你必须进行自己的计算，以确定插入标记应该出现在此项之前还是之后。The method lets you find the item closest to the mouse pointer, but you must do your own calculations to determine whether the insertion mark should appear before or after this item. 若要计算属性所需的值 ，请执行以下步骤：To calculate the value needed for the property, follow these steps: 1. 使用 方法检索离鼠标指针最近的项的索引。Use the method to retrieve the index of the item closest to the mouse pointer. 2. 将索引值传递给 方法以检索项的边框。Pass the index value to the method to retrieve the bounding rectangle of the item. 3. 如果鼠标指针位于边界矩形中点的左侧，则将 属性设置为 `false` ; 否则，请将其设置为 `true` 。If the mouse pointer is located to the left of the midpoint of the bounding rectangle, set the property to `false`; otherwise, set it to `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 概述参考主题。For more information, see the overview reference topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 插入标记功能并实现使用标准拖动事件的拖放项重新排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature and implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 在事件的处理程序中更新插入标记的位置 。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在此处理程序中，将鼠标指针的位置与最近项的中点进行比较，并使用结果来确定插入标记是显示在项的左侧还是右侧。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. 有关完整示例，请参阅 概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CPP/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CS/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/VB/listviewinsertionmarkexample.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Bounds As Rectangle
public: property System::Drawing::Rectangle Bounds { System::Drawing::Rectangle get(); };

span.span: Gets the bounding rectangle of the insertion mark.

value.span: 用于表示插入标记的位置和大小。

span.span: A that represents the position and size of the insertion mark.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 插入标记边界矩形中的坐标相对于控件的左上角 。The coordinates in the insertion mark bounding rectangle are relative to the upper-left corner of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color Color { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };
member this.Color : System.Drawing.Color with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置此插入标记的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of the insertion mark.

value.span: 一个 值，表示插入标记的颜色。

span.span: A value that represents the color of the insertion mark.

value.span: 默认值为 属性的值。

span.span: The default value is the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性将插入标记颜色设置为控件的前景色以外的值 。Use this property to set the insertion mark color to a value other than the foreground color of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 插入标记功能并实现使用标准拖动事件的拖放项重新排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature and implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 在事件的处理程序中更新插入标记的位置 。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在此处理程序中，将鼠标指针的位置与最近项的中点进行比较，并使用结果来确定插入标记是显示在项的左侧还是右侧。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. 有关完整示例，请参阅 概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CPP/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CS/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/VB/listviewinsertionmarkexample.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与插入标记旁边的项的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the item next to which the insertion mark appears.

value.span: 插入标记旁边的项的索引；如果隐藏插入标记，则为 -1。

span.span: The index of the item next to which the insertion mark appears or -1 when the insertion mark is hidden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将属性设置为，则插入标记出现在具有指定索引的项的左侧 `false` ; 否则，它将显示在项的右侧。The insertion mark appears to the left of the item with the specified index if the property is set to `false`; otherwise, it appears to the right of the item. 将拖动的项插入到集合中时，插入标记会自动消失 。The insertion mark disappears automatically when a dragged item is inserted into the collection. 若要手动删除插入标记，例如，将某个项拖动到其自身或拖放到控件外时，请将 值设置为-1。To remove the insertion mark manually, for example, when an item is dragged onto itself or dragged outside the control, set the value to -1. 使用 方法检索离指定位置最近的项的索引，如在拖放操作中定位项时鼠标指针的位置。Use the method to retrieve the index of the item closest to a specified location, such as the location of the mouse pointer when positioning an item in a drag-and-drop operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 插入标记功能并实现使用标准拖动事件的拖放项重新排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature and implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 在事件的处理程序中更新插入标记的位置 。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在此处理程序中，将鼠标指针的位置与最近项的中点进行比较，并使用结果来确定插入标记是显示在项的左侧还是右侧。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. 有关完整示例，请参阅 概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CPP/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CS/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/VB/listviewinsertionmarkexample.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 NearestIndex(valuetype System.Drawing.Point pt) cil managed
Public Function NearestIndex (pt As Point) As Integer

param.name: pt
param.span: 从 表示的位置找到最近的项。

span.span: A representing the location from which to find the nearest item.

summary.span: 检索距离指定点最近的项的索引。

span.span: Retrieves the index of the item closest to the specified point.

returns.span: 距离指定点最近的项的索引；如果最近的项就是当前被拖动的项，则为 -1。

span.span: The index of the item closest to the specified point or -1 if the closest item is the item currently being dragged.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法允许您在执行拖放操作时查找离鼠标指针最近的项。This method lets you locate the item closest to the mouse pointer when doing a drag-and-drop operation. 使用返回的索引值设置 属性。Use the index value returned to set the property. 当最接近鼠标指针的项是要拖动的项时，此方法的返回值为-1。When the item closest to the mouse pointer is the item being dragged, the return value of this method is -1. 在这种情况下，将属性设置为该值将 隐藏插入标记。In this case, setting the property to this value hides the insertion mark. 此方法查找最接近的项，而不考虑鼠标指针的位置，而 方法只返回指定位置的项，或者 `null` 如果该位置没有项，则为。This method finds the closest item regardless of where the mouse pointer is located, while the method returns the item at the specified location only, or `null` if there is no item at that location. `null` 例如，当鼠标指针位于两个项之间时，此方法将返回。The method returns `null`, for example, when the mouse pointer is located between two items. 出于此原因，在 使用拖放操作来定位项时，应始终使用方法。For this reason, you should always use the method when using a drag-and-drop operation to position items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 插入标记功能并实现使用标准拖动事件的拖放项重新排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the insertion mark feature and implements drag-and-drop item reordering using the standard drag events. 在事件的处理程序中更新插入标记的位置 。The position of the insertion mark is updated in a handler for the event. 在此处理程序中，将鼠标指针的位置与最近项的中点进行比较，并使用结果来确定插入标记是显示在项的左侧还是右侧。In this handler, the position of the mouse pointer is compared to the midpoint of the nearest item, and the result is used to determine whether the insertion mark appears to the left or the right of the item. 有关完整示例，请参阅 概述参考主题。For the complete example, see the overview reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CPP/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/CS/listviewinsertionmarkexample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView.InsertionMark/VB/listviewinsertionmarkexample.vb#3)]
